reviewer_info: Posted by Syed Ashir on Apr 29, 2022
review_text: Exterior is less fancy. Interior is really good. Fuel Economy is 17-18 km/ltr in city with AC. On highway fuel economy is 22 km/ltr with AC. I am satisfied with this car. I will totally recommend everyone to buy Suzuki Spacia as it is really budget friendly. In 15-16 bracket, you will find a good health Suzuki Spacia.
